name: I'm looking for 3024 people (Bakodun Game Studios)
name_original: I'm looking for 3024 people (Bakodun Game Studios)
description:
The dead computer engineer had only one purpose, to reveal the true face of the company he worked for. Now, this mission is up to a hacker and 3024 people.

"I'm looking for 3024 people" is the world's first alternate reality NFT game developed by Bakodun Game Studios. In this adventure, you'll need to infiltrate the company, examine the leaked documents, and monitor the live cameras.

You can download and use the infiltration software for free right now. But the main mission is to perform the 3024 slot process, and only 3024 people can do this. To perform the slot process, you need to have one of 3024 private NFTs and complete the task on the Discord server.

You can find all the details about the mission on this website: www.frankscomputer.online

"This mission can be completed overnight, or it can last a lifetime. It's in your hands."

______________________________

Infiltration Software

Use the information below to access the software.

Password 1: 907239265

After entering Password 1 correctly, press the R key 9 times, and then enter Password 2. Otherwise, Password 2 will be invalid. When you press the R key 9 times, you hear two beep sounds, and the green light turns on.

Password 2: 341625894

The software leads you to an experiment. A blind person is controlled in this experiment. This experiment will try to distract you. You have to focus on conversations. You have to trust your ears to finish the experiment.

______________________________

System Requirements

Your computer must meet the following minimum specifications to run the software. 

  • 240 MB Free Disk Space
  • Windows 7 x64 
  • 2 GHz CPU
  • 4 GB RAM
  • OpenGL 2.0 (For graphics. If your graphic card is updated you’re ready.)
  • OpenAL (For audios. If your operating system is updated you’re ready. If not, it comes with the infiltration software, you can install it separately.)
